name: Uphill Both Ways (MiniMoon)
description:
Glide around with your parachute and bounce off flies in this 2D platformer!

Calvin's backpack allows him to glide boost.  This feature gives him access to an upward draft to help him get home.

Features

15 levels (more to come)

Controller support

Unique glide boost mechanic

Pixel based graphics and animations

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MiniMoonGames

Music: Digital Voyage by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)
